skyux_phone_field_default_label._description: The label for the phone field component's input field for screen readers when the consumer has not specified a label.

skyux_phone_field_country_search_dismiss._description: Label for dismissing country search input

skyux_phone_field_country_search_label._description: Accessibility label for the  country search input

skyux_phone_field_country_select_label._description: Screen reader text for the phone field component button to select a new country.

skyux_phone_field_country_selected_label._description: Screen reader text for the phone field component to denote the selected country.
